##  Compute the Z score:

```{r}
x = rnorm(25)

mean(x) / sd(x)


z_score = function(x) {
  
  z = mean(x) / sd(x)
  z
  
}

z_score(x)
z_score(rnorm(1000))

# add control statement

z_score = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("Argument x should be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("Z scores cannot be computed for length 3 vectors")
  }
  
  z = mean(x) / sd(x)
  
  z
}
# stop controls for the error statement


z_score(c(10, 2))

```





```{r}
z_score = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("argument x should be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("z-scores cannot be computed for length 3 vectors")
  }
  
  mean_x = mean(x)
  sd_x = sd(x)
  z = mean_x / sd_x
  
  tibble(mean = mean_x, 
       sd = sd_x,
       z = z)
}

z_score(x)
```
